title: Arvyndase (Silverspeech): A Short Course in the Magical Language of The Silver Elves
description: This is a short course in using Arvyndase, which means SilverSpeech, a 33,000+ word language created by the Silver Elves. It uses a process of word substitution to gradually introduce the student to the use of the language while it speaks about the language itself, its creation, and the philosophy of the Elves. It is a language primarily created to be used in magic spells, rituals, and incantations. This book also includes a chapter of spells in Arvyndase, three scripts for use with the language, and a small dictionary of words used in the book for easy reference.
author: The Silver Elves
